item1: Franchises Licenses PPL Electric provides electricity delivery service its service territory pursuant certain franchises, licenses, statutory service areas, easements other rights permissions granted Pennsylvania state legislature, cities municipalities other entities. Pursuant authorizations Commonwealth Pennsylvania PAPUC, PPL Electric operates regulated distribution monopoly its service area. Accordingly, PPL Electric does not face competition its electricity distribution business. Pursuant Customer Choice Act, generation electricity competitive business Pennsylvania, PPL Electric does not own operate any generation facilities.
